sentences.en: "Take That" are the best group in the whole world. So there.
sentences.cn: “接招”乐队是世界上最好的组合，就是这样的。

sentences.en: Are we going to get there (= arrive ) before the banks close?
sentences.cn: 银行关门之前，我们到得了吗？

sentences.en: Can you pass me that wine glass there?
sentences.cn: 你能把那个葡萄酒杯递给我吗？

sentences.en: Don't expect me to come and visit you there.
sentences.cn: 别指望我会去那儿看你。

sentences.en: Hold it right there and don’t move.
sentences.cn: 就站在那里，不要动。

sentences.en: I think I've got one of the most stressful jobs there is.
sentences.cn: 我想我得到的这份工作是其中最繁重的工作之一。

sentences.en: In some cases there is a mini-mum age limit.
sentences.cn: 有些情况下有最低年龄限制。

sentences.en: Is there any milk left?
sentences.cn: 还有牛奶剩下吗？

sentences.en: It’s too far to drive there and back in one day.
sentences.cn: 一天开车来回太远了。

sentences.en: Look, there’s that bookshop I was telling you about.
sentences.cn: 看，那就是我跟你说过的那家书店。

sentences.en: pretty ridiculous, I know, but there it is.
sentences.cn: 我知道很可笑，但事情就是这样。

sentences.en: Scotland? I’ve always wanted to go there.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰？我一直想去那儿。

sentences.en: so there you have it — fish and chips were a West country invention.
sentences.cn: 因此情况就这样——炸鱼和炸土豆条原本是西式菜肴。

sentences.en: sometimes it is embarrassing, but there you go.
sentences.cn: 有时这令人尴尬，但没办法。

sentences.en: Suddenly there was a loud explosion.
sentences.cn: 突然传出一声巨大的爆炸声。

sentences.en: The average commuter journey there is five hours long.
sentences.cn: 那里的通勤一族平均上下班要花5个小时。

sentences.en: There are a few things we need to discuss.
sentences.cn: 有些事情我们需要讨论。

sentences.en: There are intangible benefits beyond a rise in the share price.
sentences.cn: 除股价上升之外还有无形利益。

sentences.en: There are reports of widespread dis-content in the capital.
sentences.cn: 有报道称首都弥漫着不满的情绪。

sentences.en: there goes my career.
sentences.cn: 我的职业生涯就这么被断送了。

sentences.en: There has always been a difference between community radio and commercial radio.
sentences.cn: 社区广播电台和商业广播电台一直是有区别的。

sentences.en: There has been a busy start to polling in today's local elections.
sentences.cn: 今天地方选举的投票一开始就人头攒动。

sentences.en: There has been a very mixed reaction to the decision.
sentences.cn: 对于这个决定的反应非常不一致。

sentences.en: There is a wide veranda under the overhang of the roof.
sentences.cn: 悬吊的屋顶下是一条宽阔的游廊。

sentences.en: There is no suggestion that clients have been sold inappropriate policies.
sentences.cn: 无迹象表明向客户售出了不适用的保险。

sentences.en: There must be easier ways of doing this.
sentences.cn: 这事一定还有更简单的做法。

sentences.en: There remain several questions still to be answered.
sentences.cn: 仍有几个问题要回答。

sentences.en: There seems to be a lack of communication.
sentences.cn: 看起来是缺乏沟通。

sentences.en: There was a scream of brakes from the carriageway outside.
sentences.cn: 外面车行道上传来刺耳的刹车声。

sentences.en: There was constant jeering and interruption from the floor.
sentences.cn: 议员席上不断有人在嘲讽和打岔.

sentences.en: There was not much elbow room in the cockpit of a Snipe.
sentences.cn: “沙锥鸟”战斗机的驾驶舱空间不太宽敞。

sentences.en: there you are—that'll be £3.80 please.
sentences.cn: 给你——共3.8英镑。

sentences.en: there you are! I told you the problem was a political one.
sentences.cn: 瞧！我告诉过你这是个政治问题。

sentences.en: They were all laughing when there came a knock at the door.
sentences.cn: 他们都在大笑，这时传来了敲门声。

sentences.en: We could go back to my cottage and have lunch there.
sentences.cn: 我们可以回到我的小屋去吃午饭。

sentences.en: Who’s that man over there ?
sentences.cn: 那边的那个男人是谁？

sentences.en: you can't share, so there!.
sentences.cn: 你没份，没什么可说的！。

words.tran_cn: 从而，因此；在那附近；在那方面
在那里；在那边；在那点上

phrases.tran_cn: （尤指在逆境中）支持（或安慰）某人；与某人站在一起
(非正式)早就知道，没什么稀奇
到达那里；取得成功，实现目标
(非正式)全都知道；直接了解，亲眼看到
不相干；与题目不相干；不重要
(非正式)这是我最后的决定；再没有可说的；没有商量的余地；（事情）就是这样
就这么完蛋了，就这么毁了

phrases.phrase: there you are (或 go) informal 非正式
phrases.tran_cn: 你瞧；我说对了吧；又能怎么样
这边请；这下你会懂了；你又来这一套

trans.tran_cn: 在那里，那里，在那一点上
trans.tran_en: in or to a particular place that is not where you are

trans.tran_cn: （表示满足、烦恼）你瞧，好啦，得啦
trans.tran_en: used to express satisfaction that you have been proved right or that you have done what you intended to do
used to say that something exists or happens
used to say that something exists or happens
